page.title: 11Transport - Traffic survey
page.content: We did a survey one morning between 8.30am & 9.30am on the road in and out of Walgrave and on the main Kettering -Northampton road.(A43) The survey was on how many bicycles, cars, vans, lorries, motorcycles, tractors, buses and other vehicles went through.The cars were the most numerous on both of the roads.On the Kettering to Northampton road (A43) there were 634 cars, 100 vans, 100 lorries, 13 motorcycles ,1 crane, 0 tractors and 0 bicycles.On the road through Walgrave there were 73 cars, 8 vans, 1 lorry, 1 motorcycle, 1 bus,0 tractors , 4 bicycles,and 1 milkfloat.Obviously the A43 is much busier than the village road.
